no offence <<<icon_lol.gif>>>


Tekið af netinu:

Top *** Luxury Car: Mercedes-Benz E-Class


Nei þetta er ekki myndin sem fylgdi <<<icon_lol.gif>>>


What makes it ***?
An absolutely fabulous interior.

What makes it great?
I know, most of you expected the good old BMW 5-Series to clinch the title in this segment, but in our experience, the Five's funky redesign has prompted former fans to turn their collective gaze toward the elegant Mercedes-Benz E-Class.

And if any car deserves our affections, it's the E-Class. Its good looks are hard to deny, marked by expressive quad headlamps, perfect body proportions, a gently arcing roofline and just enough chrome detailing. However, it's the interior design that sets this one apart. Whereas the Five has gone a little techno-crazy on us, the E-Class manages to integrate every feature a luxury car should have into a remarkably sensible layout. Even its newly redesigned, screen-based COMAND (which stands for Cockpit Management and Data) system works well.

One unique E-Class feature is the optional Panorama Roof, a full-glass expanse from windshield to trunk that creates an unobstructed view of the sky from any seat in the car. While only the front half slides open, both areas can be covered by motorized retractable sunshades. What's more, you can even add solar cells to the roof glass to power fans that'll keep the car ventilated on those superhot days. Now that's luxury, my friends.

One more thing: While the E320's strong V-6 and the E500's awesome V-8 are mighty nice, I recommend getting the new diesel (gasp!) if you really want to move. I know what you're thinking, aren't diesels slow and stinky? Quite the contrary: The E320 CDI delivers both neck-snapping acceleration and incredible fuel economy, all while banishing loud, clackety engine noise and black tailpipe smoke to the past where it belongs. Furthermore, you'll enjoy a nearly 800-mile range, enough to go from L.A. to San Francisco and back on one single tank of gas. Even better, the E320 CDI costs no more than a standard E320 (under $50K). Check it out; you'll be as surprised as we were.

Sergio ég trúi þessu ekki.. Allar þessar smápíkusögur.. ALLT LYGI?!

Your secret's out man, is over

get samt ekkert sagt mikið sjálf.. minn bíll var í sjötta... :$

keppnis <<<icon_cool.gif>>><<<icon_cool.gif>>>

En hvernig væri að segja okkur af hverju þú ert að skoða síðu með lista yfir Top *** Cars?

það er góð spurning .. ég var að horfá eldgamlan topgear þátt og þeir voru að tala um að mbenzinn hans jeremy væri í 1sta sæti 2003 eða e-h ansk... langaði að sjá hvernig staðan væri í dag <<<icon_lol.gif>>>
og ég hélt að yaris væri eini *** bil sem ég á, en ég á vist bara *** bíla...god dammit <<<icon_lol.gif>>>
Svið er samt soðið ekki steikt
reyndar er það brennt fyrst en ok..
segir það samt ekki okkur meira um þig enn bílana þína?
